pages.text: But weak core is only a start of metaphysics research! Empty construct ready to accept soul fragments of mobs. Seems, you need to try to feed different mobs to soul to receive advanced variants.$(li)$(l:metaphysics/end_automata_core)End Automata core$(li)$(l:metaphysics/husbandry_automata_core)Husbandry Automata core
